title: Brass Dragonborn
entryLore: Descended from the gregarious and talkative brass dragons of the hot deserts, these dragonborn command the power of fire. They often possess a friendly and inquisitive nature, reflecting the social and often eccentric personalities of their draconic kin.

traits.name: Fire Breath (Brass)
traits.description: When you use your [[breath_weapon|Breath Weapon]], it deals [[fire_damage|Fire damage]]. You choose whether the breath manifests as a 15-foot cone or a 30-foot line.
